title: Skillsoft CTO Apratim Purakayastha on Tech Hiring Trends | eWEEK - eWeek
content: Skillsoft CTO Apratim Purakayastha on Tech Hiring Trends | eWEEK  eWeek
description: Advice for companies seeking to hire top tech talent, as well as for job seekers, including the biggest skill gaps and what certifications are the most profitable.
